common.description: This is an open-source webpage to generate mental model diagrams from spreadsheets.
common.svgUnavailable: SVG content is not yet available.
common.addText:
Skyline is a tool for generating Mental Model Diagrams, visualizing how users think and behave, inspired by Indi Young's methodology to create "City Skylines". 
 Mental Model Diagrams "represent how a system works in someone’s mind" [O’Donoghue 2023]. In a
business case, the "someone" mentioned in this definition refers to the users or people the product should
be developed for. A Mental Model Diagram attempts to capture and visualize a summarized version of
the mental models of a certain group of people to provide insight into their thinking patterns. A final Mental Model Diagram resembles a
"City Skyline" [Young 2008].
